result.execSummary:
The defendant Melvin Buckholtz III was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Felon Possess Firearm, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

2:47 pm  OFF the Record -  Court reviewing jury instructions outside of Jury.  
3:07 OTR - Judge hands parties proposed Jury Instructions discussion .
3:19 bring in jury - Judge reads Jurors instructions.
3:30 PL gives closing argument:  3:39 pm DEF closing:    4:10 pm Rebuttal by PL
4:15 Court reads final instructions Bailffs sworn Jury out 418 pm
4:19 OTR - OSOJ -   State nothing, DEF requests directed verdict - court denies request
all exhibits are accounted for 1-17, jury instructions were given to the bailiff, Court will wait until jury requests exhibits and determined at that time.
4:55 pm Jurors request photos 3-16 except for #11 Exh #2 CD with 40 photos (DEF has 24 of the 40) -  5:03 pm photos given to bailiff.
5:35 Bailiffs advise Jurors are ready - assemble back into court  5:42 OTR -OSOJ    5:42 pm bring in jury   Foreperson gives verdict to bailiff;  Judge reads verdict - finding of guilty,  Judge polls the jury, all jurors concur.  Court accepts the verdict, court thanks jurors.  5:50 pm Jurors are released.
OTR - OSOJ Court orders JOC be entered,  bond continues, set for sentencing and request PSI,   SEH set for 10-11-2016 1:30 pm
